structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Patent And Proprietary Medicines; Non Controlled Substances; Exemption From Regulation
law.text: Sections thirty-six A to forty-one, inclusive, of this chapter, and sections twenty-nine to thirty G, inclusive, of chapter one hundred and thirty-eight shall not apply to the manufacture or sale of patent and proprietary medicines or any substance or drug not included or defined in chapter ninety-four C as a controlled substance.
